coastal-freedom-ride.title: Coastal Freedom Ride
coastal-freedom-ride.shortDescription: A curated coastal route with premium stops and smooth pacing.
coastal-freedom-ride.fullDescription: This premium format blends seafront roads, elegant viewpoints, and polished logistics. It is ideal for riders seeking balanced rhythm and elevated comfort.

ouidah-heritage-circuit.title: Ouidah Heritage Circuit
ouidah-heritage-circuit.shortDescription: A premium cultural itinerary between Cotonou and Ouidah.
ouidah-heritage-circuit.fullDescription: This circuit offers a balanced mix of heritage highlights, ride comfort, and curated stops. It is designed for travelers who value depth and smooth execution.

porto-novo-signature-tour.title: Porto-Novo Signature Tour
porto-novo-signature-tour.shortDescription: An elegant intercity route with curated urban highlights.
porto-novo-signature-tour.fullDescription: Designed for travelers who want a full premium day, this tour combines scenic transitions, cultural pauses, and structured support.

sunset-beach-escape.title: Sunset Beach Escape
sunset-beach-escape.shortDescription: A premium late-day ride with cinematic atmosphere.
sunset-beach-escape.fullDescription: A compact format for guests seeking style and efficiency. The route emphasizes smoothness and top visual moments before evening.

urban-riding-club-session.title: Urban Riding Club Session
urban-riding-club-session.shortDescription: An urban club session focused on premium lifestyle riding.
urban-riding-club-session.fullDescription: This session mixes urban rhythm, group energy, and social moments in a premium setup for weekend riders.

lagoon-discovery-circuit.title: Lagoon Discovery Circuit
lagoon-discovery-circuit.shortDescription: A premium lagoon itinerary with polished tourism comfort.
lagoon-discovery-circuit.fullDescription: A calm and refined route around waterside landscapes, with controlled pace and premium logistics for travelers seeking serenity.
